title: Brum to the rescue and other stories
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
Literature/English literature - Film and video adaptations
description: Brum is a miniature 1920's style vintage car. Too small to travel on the roads, Brum prefers the safety of the footpaths and byways. Full of fun - and just a little bit naughty! - Brum's curiosity leads him into all sorts of adventures as he journeys out into the big world. Meet Brum in the following four delightful episodes contained in this video: "Brum to the rescue" - Brum rescues a little girl from two bullying children. "Brum and the kite" - Learning to fly a kite leads Brum on a funny chase all over town. "Brum and the car breakers" - Brum breaks down in a rubbish dump, and is taken to the car breaker's yard. "Brum at the Opera" - Brum accidentally finds his way on to the stage during an opera performance.
